::DrillBit::

He smiled at KitKat's voice. He waited for her.

::Hot Rod::

"Yes. I will do anything for you. Now we should really get you some med
aid."

He jumped down, and transformed.
"Get in. With my rocket power I can get out of here quick."
He was thinking about taking out her Alliance programing. He could do
it, when he got a chance. He would wait till the time was right.
